scripts.dev: rm -r public && parcel src/*.pug src/docs/*.pug src/styles/main.scss src/js/cookie.js src/js/prevMail.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/global.js src/img/scmed/* src/img/NLogoHalignT.svg src/img/logoT.svg src/img/wlogoT.svg --out-dir public
scripts.build: rm -r public && parcel build src/*.pug src/docs/*.pug src/styles/main.scss src/js/cookie.js src/js/prevMail.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/global.js src/img/scmed/* src/img/NLogoHalignT.svg src/img/logoT.svg src/img/wlogoT.svg --out-dir public
